variable.name: baby_SUBJID
variable.comment: De-identified ID.

variable.name: premie
variable.comment: Based on gestational age.

variable.name: ante_hem
variable.description: Mother had antenatal hemorrhage or vaginal bleeding.
variable.comment: Placenta previa, abruption or threatened abortion resulting in bleeding, which can be external (vaginal bleeding) or occult (retroplacental clot), other than bloody show, is documented after 20 weeks of pregnancy.

variable.name: site1_bpd
variable.comment: Child received any doses or courses of systemic steroids to prevent or treat bronchopulmonary dysplasia/chronic lung disease. Does not include inhaled steroids or doses of steroids given for extubation and/or stridor.

variable.name: site1/2/4_chorio
variable.comment: Chorioamnionitis is specifically documented in the mother's medical record.

variable.name: cong
variable.description: Child has congenital anomalies or major malformations.
variable.comment: Any syndromes and/or major malformations were observed, including Down's syndrome, chromosomal abnormalities, and other syndromes with multi-organ involvement.

variable.name: site1_delivery
variable.comment: As documented on labor/delivery sheet. The final mode of delivery, if unknown, recorded as vaginal vertex.

variable.name: dur_labor_hours
variable.comment: Duration of episode of labor which resulted in the birth, in hours relative to date and time of birth.

variable.name: ga_tot
variable.comment: Best estimate of gestational age using the following hierarchy: 1) Best OB estimate/obstetrical measures based on last menstrual period, obstetrical parameters, and/or early prenatal ultrasound as recorded in the maternal chart. 2) Best neonatologist estimate/neonatologist's estimate based on physical criteria, neurologic examination, combined physical and gestational age exam (Ballard or Dubowitz), or examination of the lens.

variable.name: gaday
variable.description: Additional days of gestation after a specific week.
variable.comment: If a child is not born exactly on a gestational week (e.g. 27 weeks gestational age), this specifies how many additional days there were in the week before the child was born (e.g. 27 weeks, 3 days).

variable.name: gaweek
variable.comment: Gestational age in weeks. Same rules as for the variable=ga_tot.

variable.name: grav
variable.comment: The number of confirmed pregnancies, including this one.

variable.name: hyper_pre_eclamp
variable.description: Mother diagnosed with hypertension, preeclampsia, or eclampsia.
variable.comment: Hypertension, chronic or pregnancy induced, with or without edema and proteinuria, is specifically recorded in the mother's chart, or if a maternal blood pressure above 140 systolic or 90 diastolic recorded prior to or during the present pregnancy.

variable.name: site1/5/6_iddm
variable.description: Mother has insulin dependent diabetes mellitus.
variable.comment: Mother has diabetes mellitus requiring insulin for control, diagnosed during or prior to present pregnancy.

variable.name: site1_ivh
variable.description: Child had any grade of intraventricular hemorrhage on either side of brain.

variable.name: length_36wk
variable.description: Child's length at 36 weeks gestational age.

variable.name: late_sepsis
variable.description: Late onset sepsis (positive blood culture after 72 hours of age).

variable.name: site1/2/3_mar_stat
variable.description: Mother's marital status at time of delivery.
variable.comment: Mother's marital status at time of delivery. Coded as 'married' if mother is currently married, or 'married but separated' (including legal separations). Coded as 'single' if single, divorced, or widowed.

variable.name: site1_mat_educ
variable.description: Maternal education level at time of delivery.
variable.comment: Highest level of education achieved by the biological mother at the time of this delivery.

variable.name: site1/2/3_mult_birth
variable.description: Is child a multiple, e.g. twin, triplet?

variable.name: site1/6_nec
variable.comment: Coded 'no' when there is no necrotizing enterocolitis present or in the presence of Bell's Stage IA or IB.

variable.name: nec_surgery
variable.description: Child had surgery as treatment for necrotizing enterocolitis.

variable.name: ofc
variable.description: Child's occipital frontal circumference at birth.

variable.name: ofc_36wk
variable.description: Child's occipital frontal circumference at 36 weeks gestational age.

variable.name: para
variable.description: Total number of live births the mother has had.
variable.comment: The number of products of conception delivered after 20 weeks gestation, resulting in the birth of a child, including this delivery. This includes live births only.

variable.name: pda
variable.comment: Clinical evidence of left to right PDA shunt documented by continuous murmur, hyperdynamic precordium, bounding pulses, wide pulse pressure, congestive heart failure, increased pulmonary vasculature or cardiomegaly by CXR, and/or increased oxygen requirement or ECHO evidence of PDA with documentation of left to right ductal shunting.

variable.name: pre_atb
variable.description: Antibiotics were administered during admission resulting in this delivery.
variable.comment: Any antibiotics were used during the admission resulting in this delivery.

variable.name: pre_care
variable.comment: Mother had at least one prenatal care visit for this pregnancy.

variable.name: pre_ster
variable.description: Steroids given before delivery; prenatal steroids given for fetal lung maturity, not for maternal disease.

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of child; recorded the same race as the mother.
variable.comment: Recorded as race of mother.

variable.name: rop
variable.description: Child diagnosed with any retinopathy of prematurity.

variable.name: seiz
variable.comment: Seizures treated with an anti-convulsant for more than 72 hours.

variable.name: toco
variable.description: Mother was given tocolytics during the pregnancy to delay labor.
variable.comment: The mother received pharmacologic agents to control contractions and prevent preterm delivery.

variable.name: weight_36wk
variable.description: Child's weight at 36 weeks gestational age.
